definition: thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: The pangolin whole body's lamella is its thorn, is similar with the nail.
sentences.chinese: 穿山甲浑身的鳞片就是它的刺，与指甲相类似。

sentences.english: This one showed us why it was called saw scaled viper.
sentences.chinese: 这一次我们算是见识到什么叫做锯状鳞片蝰蛇。

sentences.english: The building is wrapped in a fine, almost scaly veil of stainless steel wire mesh.
sentences.chinese: 该建筑被包裹在很精细的类似鳞片状的不锈钢丝网内。

sentences.english: The morphology and composition of the pangolin's scale were analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 对穿山甲鳞片的形态和组成进行了分析。

sentences.english: The epicuticle overlying the gland is smooth and lack of scales.
sentences.chinese: 覆盖分泌腺的表皮表面光滑，无鳞片和毛状突起。

sentences.english: Seeds narrowly winged along angles or transversely squamulose winged.
sentences.chinese: 种子狭翅沿着棱或横向的具小鳞片状翅。

sentences.english: Its body is usually covered with scales to protect it.
sentences.chinese: 它的身体表面常腹盖满鳞片，这些鳞片起保护作用。

sentences.english: Its body is usually covered with scales to protect it.
sentences.chinese: 它的身体表面常腹盖满鳞片，这些鳞片起保护作用。

sentences.english: The application of glass scale coating in sulfur-containing waste water tank was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 文章介绍了玻璃鳞片涂料用于含硫污水罐的使用情况。

sentences.english: The chair stands on flute legs , and its top carved with elegant foliate motif .
sentences.chinese: 主持站在长笛腿的，其顶部刻有精美图案鳞片。

sentences.english: The primordial meristem at the tip of rhizome is surrounded by 3-5 lepises.
sentences.chinese: 根状茎顶端的原分生组织由3～5个鳞片包被。

sentences.english: Scales attaching to the base of petiole are brown, lanceolate.
sentences.chinese: 叶柄基部鳞片棕色，披针形。

sentences.english: It's its bulging eyes, which are covered with scaly lids.
sentences.chinese: 这是其膨胀的眼睛，上面覆着鳞片盖子。

sentences.english: The Coelacanth has very large eyes and distinct silver blue scales with white markings.
sentences.chinese: 它们有很大的眼睛和独特的蓝色带白斑的鳞片。

sentences.english: Squama will fall off when push it.
sentences.chinese: 在鳞片上轻轻一按，鳞片就会脱落。

sentences.english: Squama will fall off when push it.
sentences.chinese: 在鳞片上轻轻一按，鳞片就会脱落。

definition: surface of the body/periphery of the body/body thermometer/(literary) a person's appearance
